channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: Why does Gil Pe√±alosa‚Äôs Wikipedia page redirect to his brother‚Äôs? https://t.co/T0MhXoXbDY
I‚Äôve gotten 76 claps on this Medium post I wrote last year. https://t.co/gBG9nxlBPv
@domesticat Thanks for pointing that out! I added it to this page: https://t.co/JOc3dnay3F
@davewiner @waded FWIW, when I first heard about Bingeworthy, my mind immediately went to spongeworthy, and I thought for sure that was at least one of the reasons why you called it that.
Vancouver‚Äôs ‚Äúnews story of the 20th century‚Äù continues to leak into the 21st century. https://t.co/5naEFRnZun

Now, a decade and a half later, you can go up on a steep hill in Silicon Valley and look out, and with the right kind of eyes you can almost see the high-water mark of the blogosphere‚Äîthat place where the wave finally broke and rolled back. https://t.co/Rxbpj055VA

Yet another article about a company opening an office in Toronto that doesn‚Äôt mention a disease that we can get even if vaccinated, which shreds our lungs and causes permanent brain damage, that we‚Äôll get over and over until it ultimately kills us. https://t.co/y1lVP0GZ93

@wjfarr @DumasRaphael Amazing. This rings true. I think I know what my weakness is. Hopefully I‚Äôm right, and hopefully, if it already happened, it was only for a few dollars. https://t.co/dDICBlOudD
‚ÄúTests positive for [X]‚Äù has entered business lingo, if you were wondering.

*Owen Wilson Wow* https://t.co/fAVgE5sGXL
I‚Äôm looking forward to applying for my contribution rebate after I donate to his campaign. https://t.co/IB6NZhyqKy
@Sean_YYZ It‚Äôs funny to me that we get to test Mark Shapiro‚Äôs theory without actually having ActiveTO.
Teoscar Hern√°ndez is ridiculous.

This is such a weird home-field advantage that the Toronto Blue Jays have. https://t.co/1CqQYW3zu1
https://t.co/wZctaNfw2c
@rcousine üçã

@theScoreHelp @Mentoch Can you consider at least adding #WEURO2022 to the app the next time the tournament happens? (I guess it would be #WEURO2026.) I would like to have followed the Icelandic women‚Äôs team like I can for the men‚Äôs team. https://t.co/9dDkytIRhz

@theScoreHelp How would I follow the Icelandic woman‚Äôs football team (@footballiceland) in the app? They‚Äôre in the UEFA Women‚Äôs Euro 2022 #WEURO2022 and I‚Äôd like to be notified of in-game events like I can for the men‚Äôs team. https://t.co/p3MmYr8Z8g
*Owen Wilson Wow* https://t.co/fH9CbuXayj

Somebody picked up a half a garbage bag worth of litter at a Toronto park this evening and people are talking about it. https://t.co/cOoSIq4cnZ
Just kidding, it was me. People really were talking about it, though. I‚Äôd rather the City do it, which is what I said to anybody who came up to me and thanked me.
I left the dead bird on the ground because I figured that one was God‚Äôs plan.
üé∂ ‚ÄúI feel good, sometimes I don‚Äôt, aay!‚Äù üé∂ https://t.co/0nVG5lXma0
Ever feel hungover in the morning because you did so much the previous day? That‚Äôs how I feel, except with how much trash I picked up at the local park yesterday.

I made my first Sloane Peterson sighting of the summer today, 21 days in.
So begins what I expect is a Sloane Peterson Cluster Phenomenon, which is where, if you see one woman who looks like Sloane Peterson, you start seeing them everywhere for a few days, then none for two weeks.
@dailysimpsons https://t.co/tjQ1uZySsb

I‚Äôm normally against trees on sidewalks (they effectively halve the width of them) but I love these ones. These ones are part of the bike lane barrier! It annoys me that the electrical poles are still where they are, though. https://t.co/RHO3MxzHJ9

Is it weird that the security guard and painters in my building aren‚Äôt wearing masks when there‚Äôs still a disease that we can get even if vaccinated, which shreds our lungs and causes permanent brain damage, that we‚Äôll get over and over until it ultimately kills us?
@toddsieling I thought about this tweet all day.
@Planta https://t.co/g3uaU0IsCl
@syncros Oh yes. Even the bad ones are good.
